job.title: Software Engineer (DevOps Engineer)
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrDevOps Engineer  As part of the Corporate Risk Data Services Team this individual will partner closely with Development amp Business Teams on various applications to drive out and mature the Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery principles under the Agile framework This will include maintaining and supporting lower level and production environments responding to and troubleshooting escalated environmental issues supporting systemapplication rollouts driving efficiently automation and streamlining efforts throughout the delivery pipeline and conducting technical analysis and producing recommendationsbrulli Collaborating with big data platform MapR Hortonworks MongoDB developerslili Collaborating with developers and tech leads to deliver Restful API integration serviceslili Design  collaborate build and implement automated application delivery improvements to test and production environmentslili Drive the automation opportunities in build test deployment and release arenas encompassing various technologies and toolslili Understand the process and technical complexities of performing application builds testing deployments and releaseslili Improve and extend the existing process to a unattended delivery pipeline Continuous Integration Continuous Delivery and Continuous Testinglili Drive out technical release coordination activities across several teams simultaneouslylili Support application releases by performing pre and post implementation taskslili Be a key contributor to initiatives that require technical expertiselili Identify process and technical improvement areas and propose solutionbrliulstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli5 years of software engineering experiencelili2 years of experience with Continuous Integration tools such as Jenkins UDeploy Urbancode Deploy or a combination of bothlili2 years of Agile experiencelili2 years of experience with source coding in one or a combination of the
